tool.name: clustering-seurat
tool.description: Perform dimensionnality reduction and pseudo-time ordering on cells

param.name: matrix
param.label: Source file

param.name: cells
param.label: Source file

param.name: genes
param.label: Source file

param.name: normalize
param.label: Boolean weither to normalize data or not

param.name: scale
param.label: Boolean weither to scale data for PCA or not

param.name: detection_threshold
param.label: Minimum number of count to consider a gene as detected

param.name: ncells
param.label: Number of detection needed to keep a gene

param.name: hvg_method
param.label: Method for Highly variable genes detection : must be one of scran, seurat or none (no filtering)

param.name: low_mean
param.label: Minimum mean logtransformed expression value to keep a gene

param.name: high_mean
param.label: Maximum mean logtransformed expression value to keep a gene

param.name: var
param.label: Minimum variability (as Z-score for Seurat or biological component for scran) to keep a gene

param.name: use_spike
param.label: Boolean weither to use or not spikes (only used with scran algorithm)

param.name: nreplicate
param.label: Number of jackstraw repitions

param.name: proportion
param.label: Proportion of random features at each jackstraw iteration

param.name: significativity
param.label: Significaty threshold for a principal component under jackstraw testing

param.name: score_threhsold
param.label: Significaty threshold for a gene on one component under jackstraw testing

param.name: resolution
param.label: Resolution parameter for clustering

param.name: k
param.label: Number of nearest neighbours to consider

param.name: k_scale
param.label: Granularity option for k

param.name: algorithm
param.label: Which clustering algorithm to use : must be one of Louvain, Louvain.multilevel, or SLM

param.name: sparse
param.label: Boolean weither to use sparse matrix to store graph (recommanded for 10X data)
